mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id , p.creator_id, p.tag, p.title, p.description , p.project_thumbnail_img , p.project_date , p.project_hits, p.category1, p.category2_pj, o.price FROM project p JOIN project_options o ON p.project_id = o.project_id ORDER BY p.project_hits DESC LIMIT 9

SELECT a.*, count(r.project_review_id) review_count, AVG(r.rating) AS average_reviews, s.price single_price, t.basic_price triple_price
FROM project a LEFT JOIN project_review r ON a.project_id = r.project_id left outer join project_package_single s on a.project_id = s.project_id left outer join project_package_triple t on a.project_id = t.project_id GROUP BY a.project_id order by average_reviews desc limit #{limit}

SELECT a.*, count(r.project_review_id) review_count, AVG(r.rating) AS average_reviews, (select ps.price from project_package_single ps where a.project_id = ps.project_id) price FROM project a LEFT JOIN project_review r ON a.project_id = r.project_id WHERE creator_id=#{creator_id} GROUP BY a.project_id order by average_reviews desc

select p.*, s.pkg_title, s.pkg_description, s.price, s.revision, s.workdays, t.basic_pkg_title, t.basic_pkg_description, t.basic_revision, t.basic_price, t.basic_workdays, t.economy_pkg_title, t.economy_pkg_description, t.economy_revision, t.economy_price, t.economy_workdays, t.premium_pkg_title, t.premium_pkg_description, t.premium_revision, t.premium_price, t.premium_workdays, u.user_name, u.thumbnail_store_filename from project p left outer join project_package_single s on p.project_id = s.project_id left outer join project_package_triple t on p.project_id = t.project_id left outer join user u on p.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE p.project_id = #{projectId}
